data.text: @Nerdy_Nurse_ #ToriesUnfitToGovern #JohnsonOut36  The Government : Cancel the proposed £2000 payrise for MPS - Sign the Petition! https://t.co/E9t7drbwql via @UKChange
@Nerdy_Nurse_ Someone has to pay them for all the partying and fun they had during lockdown, right?
@Nerdy_Nurse_ Greedy self serving pigs. People haven’t got the money for food or fuel and they get a pay rise plus expenses and subsidised food. It reeks of corruption. I’m beyond disgusted

@Nerdy_Nurse_ As. HCA I'll be getting below minimum wage from April 👍🏻.
But the MPs...yes they deserve a pay rise 🤣
@Nerdy_Nurse_ Remember when they each got £10,000 so they could afford wi fi during lockdown?

@RitchUK1 @Nerdy_Nurse_ It is due to tories,odd how they will change some independent commission like the Electoral Commission or make changes to the Independent Commission on Local Government Finance, and others but not on their wage commission which is even against johnson saying no to this pay rise.
@Nerdy_Nurse_ Do you know that some MPs are not all in the Conservative party?

@PalmyraWolf @Nerdy_Nurse_ Why should staff stay for peanuts and grief when very few actually appreciate them. Be prepared to pay for private health care as there will soon be no staff. That will given you more to troll about.

@MichaelBalmer19 @Nerdy_Nurse_ I find it laughable and insulting that an "Independent Pay Review Body " can justify their pay award but another such as this cant justify a few measly pounds to Nhs workers for their review and who are now 20% behind inflation. 
Be prepared to pay private for your health care.
